summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Employee's Retirement System, amending Seattle Municipal Code Sections 4.36.100 and adding new sections to provide opportunities for membership to temporary, intermittent, provisional and interim workers, and persons in certain part-time positions; amending Section 4.36.170 relating to City contributions; adding a new Subsection 4.36.210 I for calculation of "final compensation" of such workers; and adding a new section 4.36.125 for determination of "creditable service".
